Sending submissions over HTTPS exposes t:
Sending submissions over HTTPS exposes the act of doing so, but not the content.

Also, hiding the fact that you are submitting something makes the submission anonymous, which is strongly recommended.

This can be achieved with the use of the Tor Browser, providing anonymisation not found in other browsers like Internet Explorer, Firefox, Chrome, Opera etc.
Server temporarly unusable due to resour: Noden är tillfälligt oanvändbar på grund av låga resurser. Meddela administratören om du kan.

The level of this alarm is HIGH; Tip sub: The level of this alarm is HIGH; Tip submission has been disabled for any potential whistleblower; To re-enable it, add disk space.
The level of this alarm is LOW; don’t pa: The level of this alarm is LOW; don’t panic, your system is doing well.
The level of this alarm is MEDIUM; don’t: The level of this alarm is MEDIUM; don’t panic, but deal with it as soon as possible.
The manual configuration wizard will gui: The manual configuration wizard will guide you through the setup of HTTPS from an alternative Certificate Authority.
The name of the file and its content can: The name of the file and its content can be intentionally misleading.

The number of activities recently detect: The number of activities recently detected appears to be higher than usual.

The parent organization, the Internet Se: The parent organization, the Internet Security Research Group, is committed to providing the service for free.

The platform does not seem to be reachab: The platform does not seem to be reachable with the hostname configured.
The platform is still not configured for: The platform is still not configured for HTTPS connections and should be used just for testing purposes.
The platform must be reachable through a: The platform must be reachable through a public IP address and the hostname selected must have a corresponding DNS record that references that address.

These files have been attached to your s: These files have been attached to your submission by the recipients.
These profiles contain settings used by: These profiles contain settings used by successful projects in each respective field.
this configuration only applies to recip: this configuration only applies to recipients
This configuration wizard will guide you: This configuration wizard will guide you through the setup of HTTPS. The interface can generate a Private Key and a Certificate Signing Request. The Certificate Signing Request can be provided to a Certificate Authority to retrieve a Certificate. After having validated your request and your ownership of the hostname, the Certificate Authority will issue you a Certificate and provide a file containing Intermediate Certificates. Load the Certificate and the file containing the Intermediate Certificates to complete the HTTPS setup. Please note that the file format expected for all files uploaded is PEM. Sometimes Certificate Authorities will provide certificates in DER format which must be converted to PEM.
This could be a sign of an attack (for e: This could be a sign of an attack (for example, someone flooding your server with bogus information) or just a usage spike due to an increased visibility of your project.
This custom text is no longer displayed: This custom text is no longer displayed on the platform. The original text has either changed or been removed.
This email will be resent in the next ho: This email will be resent in the next hours if the issue is not resolved.
This feature keeps regular people from v: This feature keeps regular people from visiting the platform while it is still under development and should not be used for security purposes. The input password is stored in plaintext on the server.
This happens whenever encryption is unav: Det här händer om krypteringen inte är tillgänglig.
This interface allows configuration of t: This interface allows configuration of the email templates used for notifying administrators.
This interface allows configuration of the email templates used for notifying recipients.
This interface allows configuring email: This interface allows configuring email templates used to notify custodians.
This interface may help you understand h: Detta gränssnitt kan kanske hjälpa dig att förstå hur server. kan konfigureras och få lite information om huruvida man ansluter till andra GlobaLeaks-användare och experter.
This is a test email sent out from the p: This is a test email sent out from the platform's administrative interface.
This is an email to inform you that the: Detta är ett meddelande för att informera dig om att giltighetstiden för PGP nycklarna till följande användare snart kommer att gå ut, eller redan har gått ut.
This is an email to inform you that your: Detta är ett meddelande för att informera dig om att giltighetstiden för din PGP nycklel snart kommer att gå ut, eller redan har gått ut.
This is an email to notify you of a new: This is an email to notify you of a new comment on an existing submission.
This is an email to notify you of a new message on an existing submission.
This is an email to notify you that a cu: This is an email to notify you that a custodian has authorized you to access to the whistleblowing identity for the submission {TipNum}.
This is an email to notify you that a custodian has denied you access to the wistleblowing identity for the submission {TipNum}.
This is an email to notify you that a re: This is an email to notify you that a recipient has requested access to the whistleblower's identity for the submission {TipNum}
This is an email to notify you that a wh: This is an email to notify you that a whistleblower has selected you as a valuable recipient of their submission.
This is an email to notify you that the: This is an email to notify you that the whistleblower for the submission {TipNum} has provided their identity.
This is an email to notify you that the whistleblower of submission {TipNum} has attached new material.

This means that if the server running th: This means that if the server running the platform were to be seized, it would be possible to extract the files that have been submitted.
This means that the submitted files will: Detta betyder att de inskickade filerna kommer att lagras i vanlig text på server..
This platform makes use of GlobaLeaks so: This platform makes use of GlobaLeaks software specifically designed to protect the identity for submitter and recipient in the exchange of content.

Using automatic HTTPS configuration will: Using automatic HTTPS configuration will handle the entire process of requesting, enabling and renewing certificates from the Let's Encrypt Certificate Authority.
Using Let's Encrypt requires agreement t: Using Let's Encrypt requires agreement to their Terms of Service.
Waiting for the file(s) to finish upload: Waiting for the file(s) to finish uploading.
We do not discriminate based on race and: Vi bryr oss inte om din ras, din sexuella läggning eller ditt kön, men vi diskriminerar baserat på datorer :)
We will try to get back to you as soon a: Vi försöker återkomma till dig så snart som möjligt!
Welcome! Choose a strong password to act: Welcome! Choose a strong password to activate your account.

Without a valid certificate, the platfor: Without a valid certificate, the platform will be accessible in a secure way only via Tor.
Without a valid PGP key, the system will: Utan giltiga PGP-nycklar kan systemet inte skicka krypterade meddelanden till dem,
Without a valid PGP key, the system won': Without a valid PGP key, the system won't be able to encrypt data provided to you.
You are about to delete a file permanent: Du är på väg att ta bort en fil permanent!
You are asked to pay special attention t: You are asked to pay special attention to the information and material contained therein. Please keep in mind that whistleblowers often expose themselves to high personal risks in the interest of the public. Therefore the material provided within this submission should be considered to be of high importance.
You are aware of the risks involved. Go: Du är medventen om riskerna. Forsätt, och vet att du är varnad.
You are connecting to the server without: Du ansluter dig till server. utan anonymitet, och den här server. stödjer bara tips som lämnas anonymt
You are not allowed to attach new files.
You are not allowed to send messages.
You are not allowed to write comments.
You are receiving this email to suggest: You are receiving this email to suggest you to look into this issue and determine if the origin is legit or malicious.
You are running an unsupported and poten: You are running an unsupported and potentially vulnerable browser.
You are strongly advised to download and: You are strongly advised to download and install the Tor Browser.
You are strongly advised to visit this s: Vi rekommenderar dig starkt att besöka den här sajten med programmet Tor Browser som skyddar din identitet.
You have not set up your encryption key,: You have not set up your encryption key, so the files will not be encrypted prior to being stored on the server.
You have succesfully completed the platf: You have succesfully completed the platform wizard. You are now ready to further tweak the platform with the admin interface.
You must select at least one recipient.
You should extend its validity and updat: You should extend its validity and update the key present on the platform, or upload a new key.
You will not be able to send a submissio: Du kommer inte att kunna skicka information
Your browser will be redirected to the f: Your browser will be redirected to the following URL.
